comments:
Build 20030107

Sorry no steps to reproduce. Found this in my .log after exiting the workspace.
No dialog warned me about this.

We fixed this - it is caused by the fact that you deleted some section 
annotations and we were not expecting that in the GUI (you should not delete 
them, BTW - just delete the text for the sections and they will be skipped in 
the document generation).
